job.title: Lead Data Scientist
job.description: ltulgtltligtwe are a big python shop ideally we like folks who worked in python but will also talk to someone with r backgroundltligtltligtlead data scientist wont manage a team hands on individual contributorltligtltligtcomfort in environments where large projects are timeboxed and therefore consequential design decisions may need to be made and acted upon rapidlyltligtltligtwe like people who has experience with any of these areas deep learning and its many incarnations eg adversarial networks convolutional networks recurrent recursive residual nets natural language processing nlp image recognition anomaly detection speech recognition timeseries forecasting geospatial modeling bayesian networks or bayesian inference more generally reinforcement learning unsupervised techniques or other data science and statistical tools and methodsltligtltligtcandidates with fluency in the mathematical primitives and generalizations of data science eg expertise in linear algebra and vector calculus usually do wellltligtltligtsolid theoretical grounding in the mathematical core of the major ideas in data scienceltligtltulgt
